name: Kuroki
description:
The phone rings, the knock on the wooden door. When you sleep, well. Then he strikes"

Kuroki is a indie horror game developed from two bluedrift interactive developers, Patrick & Dan. Patrick is Portuguese so Dan translated it to English. We focused more on chases, atmosphere and suspense rather than jumpscares. There are puzzles ranging difficulty from easy to hard, there are chases that range difficulty from medium to hard.
What will you do in your dreams? Die to survive?

NOTE This game is around 40 minutes. (if you know what your doing.)

Brief Overview 

Kuroki is a game inspired by 'Ao Oni', 'Hello Hell...o?" and "It Moves" developed by SnowOwl. The phone rings, the knock on the wooden door. When you sleep, well. Then he strikes.

based on a game developed by noprops.
